StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiterReferrals]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RecruiterList xml = null, @RecruiterID uniqueiden..er = null, @OrgID int = null, @StartWeek DateTime, @EndWeek DateTime ) AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
Select p.PersonId id,p.ProspectId, per.FirstName, per.LastName, P.Recrui.ngPersonId RecruiterID, P.Source, P.PACCreateDate ReferralDate, null ContractDate, p.NwaId, per.LastName + ', ' + per.FirstName [Name], p.Ac.vity AS Ac.vity, hs.HighSchool_Name [School], rp.Rank_Code + ' ' + pr.Last_Name [Recruiter], pp.PhoneNumber [Telephone]
FROM USMC.Prospect P inner join USMC.Person per on per.PersonId = P.PersonId inner join MCRISS.dbo.Recrui.ng_Person RP on RP.Rowguid = P.Recrui.ngPersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonPhone pp ON per.PersonId = pp.PersonId AND pp.PersonPhoneTypeId = 1 INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectSchool ps ON ps.ProspectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.HIGH_SCHOOL hs on hs.rowguid = ps.SchoolId INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.PERSON pr on pr.Person_Id = rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id Where P.ReferralSSN is not null AND (RP.ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID or @OrgID is null) AND (P.Recrui.ngPersonId = @RecruiterID or @RecruiterID is null) AND ( P.PACCreateDate between @StartWeek and @EndWeek)
union
Select N.rowguid id, pro.ProspectId, pr..rst_name, pr.last_name, RP.rowguid RecruiterID, RF.REFERRAL_TYPE Source, null ReferralDate, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE ContractDate, n.rowguid NwaId, per.LastName + ', ' + per.FirstName [Name], pro.Ac.vity AS Ac.vity, hs.HighSchool_Name [School], rp.Rank_Code + ' ' + pr.Last_Name [Recruiter], pp.PhoneNumber [Telephone]
FROM MCRISS.dbo.REFERRAL RF inner join MCRISS.dbo.Contract C On C.CONTRACT_ID = RF.CONTRACT_ID inner join MCRISS.dbo.NWA N on N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID inner join MCRISS.dbo.Recrui.ng_Person RP on RP.Recrui.ng_Person_Id = N.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pro ON pro.NwaId = n.rowguid INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person per ON per.PersonId = pro.PersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonPhone pp ON per.PersonId = pp.PersonId AND pp.PersonPhoneTypeId = 1 INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectSchool ps ON ps.ProspectId = pro.ProspectId INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.HIGH_SCHOOL hs on hs.rowguid = ps.SchoolId INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.PERSON pr on pr.Person_Id = rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id Where ( N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @OrgID or @OrgID is null) AND (RP.rowguid = @RecruiterID or @RecruiterID is null) AND (C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE between @StartWeek and @EndWeek)
END
